info.description:
Odds-API.io is a powerful sports betting odds comparison API, providing real-time data from 250+ bookmakers across 10+ sports with near zero latency.

- 250+ bookmakers supported
- 10+ sports including Football, Basketball, Tennis, Esports and more
- Real-time odds with close to zero latency
- Pre-match & In-play odds coverage
- 99.9% uptime for reliability
info.title: Odds-API.io - Real-Time Sports Betting Odds API (v3)

get.description: Returns active arbitrage opportunities filtered by bookmakers. Only returns opportunities where ALL legs use the specified bookmakers.
Fetch a list of supported bookmakers
Fetch the list of bookmakers selected by the authenticated user

put.description: Remove all selected bookmakers for the authenticated user (limited to once every 12 hours)
Add bookmakers to the authenticated user

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of bookmaker names (e.g. Bet365,SingBet)
parameters.name: bookmakers

get.description: Returns events with enhanced filtering and pagination

parameters.description: Filter by participant ID (home or away)
parameters.name: participantId

parameters.description: Filter by bookmaker name - returns only events that have odds available from this bookmaker (e.g. SingBet)
parameters.name: bookmaker

get.description: Returns all currently live events from all sports with optional sport filter

parameters.description: Sport slug to filter by (e.g. football)
parameters.name: sport

get.description: Searches all upcoming events using a text query. Returns up to 10 results.
Returns a single event by its unique identifier
Returns a list of leagues (name, slug, event count) for a specified sport
Returns odds comparison for a specific event from selected bookmakers.
Returns all historical odds movements for a specific market type and handicap line of a specific event from a bookmaker.

parameters.description: Market type name (e.g. ML, Spread, Totals)
parameters.name: market

parameters.description: Handicap line (e.g. 0.5, 1.0, 2.5) - not required for ML markets
parameters.name: marketLine

get.description: Returns odds comparison for up to 10 events from selected bookmakers (counts as only 1 request).

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of up to 10 Event IDs
parameters.name: eventIds

get.description: Returns updated event odds for a specific bookmaker since a given UNIX timestamp (max 1 minute old)
get.summary: Get updated event odds since a given timestamp

get.description: Returns participants (teams) for a specified sport

parameters.description: Search term to filter by name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Returns a single participant by its unique identifier
Returns a list of sports with name and slug
Returns value bets for a specific bookmaker with optional match info. Updated every 5 seconds.
